public interface ICallSession
extends IIdentifiable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable

sendInitiate

void sendInitiate(ID initiator,
                  ID receiver,
                  ICallDescription[] descriptions,
                  ICallTransportCandidate[] transports)
                  throws CallException
Send initiate message with given descriptions and transport candidates

Parameters:
initiator - the ID of the initiator
receiver - the target receiver of the initiate request
descriptions - one or more descriptions
transports - one or more transports
Throws:
CallException - exception if cannot send initiate

sendTerminate

void sendTerminate()
                   throws CallException
Send terminate message to given receiver

Throws:
CallException - exception if cannot send terminate
